## Principles
- Explicit parameters for every step
- Logged provenance (seed, sessionInfo, checksums)
- Reproducible outputs

## Planned pipeline
1. Read corpus (UCI + etoiles)
2. Clean + tokenize
3. Segment into UCE
4. Lemmatize (lexique)
5. Build matrices/tables
6. Run analyses + export artifacts
